availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James E. Wright (Logan County, KY, county court clerk)

body.p: Russellville, Kentucky, county court clerk. Missouri native. Married to Sarah "Sally" A. Robertson Wright in Logan County, Kentucky, on January 13, 1848. Father of William M. Wright. Resident in Logan County in 1850. Agent appointed by the Kentucky auditor on April 11, 1853 to 1865. County Court clerk in Logan County in 1860. Employed Lina Wood as a servant in Logan County in 1860. Employed one enslaved person in Logan County in 1860. County court clerk in Logan County from 1860 to 1865.
